definitions: a person who interprets a constitution (especially the US Constitution) in a manner that aims to follow how it would have been understood or was intended to be understood at the time it was written

examples.text: we hoped he would only appoint originalists to the Supreme Court

shortDefinitions: person who interprets constitution as it would have been understood when written

definitions: a person who interprets a text in a way consistent with how it would have been understood or was intended to be understood at the time it was written

examples.text: originalists believe the Bible was not meant to be translated through the filter of contemporary western cultural standards

shortDefinitions: person who interprets text as it would have been understood when written

definitions: relating to or advocating for an interpretation of a constitution (especially the US Constitution) that aims to follow how it would have been understood or was intended to be understood at the time it was written

examples.text: he is known for an originalist approach that makes him the most conservative member of the bench

shortDefinitions: relating to interpretation of constitution as it would have been understood when written

definitions: relating to or advocating for an interpretation of a text in a way consistent with how it would have been understood or was intended to be understood at the time it was written

examples.text: an originalist interpretation of the Bible would permit stoning

shortDefinitions: relating to interpretation of text as it would have been understood when written
